race.name: Monaco Gravel Race
race.tagline: Monaco/French Alps—110km of steep climbs, 2,500m elevation, iconic location, 20-25% DNF.

terrain.surface: 70% gravel, 30% paved roads. Monaco/French Alps—steep climbs, technical. 2,500 m over 110 km = very steep. Monaco start/finish. Technical rating: 5/5.

biased_opinion.summary: Monaco Gravel Race is Monaco/French Alps—110 km, 2,500 m elevation. Founded ~2020. 70% gravel, 30% paved. Steep climbs, technical. 300-500 riders. Monaco start/finish (iconic location). October autumn conditions (12-22°C). Expensive entry (€150-€200 / $165-$220). If you want Monaco/French Alps iconic location with brutal steep climbs, this is it. If you need manageable elevation or budget race, skip it. 20-25% DNF.
biased_opinion.bottom_line: Monaco Gravel Race is Monaco/French Alps brutality. 110 km, 2,500 m, very steep, 20-25% DNF. If you want Monaco iconic location with French Alps climbs, this is it. If you need manageable elevation or budget race, skip it. Expensive but iconic. Brutal.

logistics.travel_summary: Fly to Nice (NCE). Rental car or shuttle (30 km, 30-minute drive to Monaco). Monaco lodging—expensive, book early. Day-before packet pickup. Race October. Post-race party in Monaco.
logistics.food_options: Aid stations on course. Post-race party in Monaco.

course_description.character: 110 km, 2,500 m. 70% gravel, 30% paved. Monaco/French Alps—steep climbs, technical. Technical rating: 5/5.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: French Alps Steep Climbs
suffering_zones.description: 2,500 m over 110 km = very steep. French Alps climbs. Brutal.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Very low gears. Pace conservatively. 2,500 m / 110 km is brutal. 20-25% DNF here.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: Technical Terrain
suffering_zones.description: Technical French Alps gravel. Steep climbs. Technical rating: 5/5.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: 35-40mm tubeless. Technical skills required. Steep climbs. Focus on next aid.

course_description.signature_challenge: 110 km + 2,500 m elevation = very steep. Monaco/French Alps. 20-25% DNF.

history.origin_story: Monaco Gravel Race founded ~2020. Monaco start/finish. 110 km, 300-500 riders. Monaco/French Alps. Steep climbs.
history.reputation: Monaco gravel scene. Monaco/French Alps. Iconic location. Steep climbs. Brutal. 20-25% DNF.
